basics.name: Mushahid Khan
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Recently I've become involved in a couple of Django efforts I like getting involved in improving user experience . I do frequently contribute to stackoverflow community & occasionally contribute to open source.

work.summary: Recruiterbox is the easiest way to receive and manage job applications to your company. It is more efficient than email and simpler than any other recruitment software.
highlights: Working primarily on BackboneJS, developing reusable user interface components and gets involved in UX design.

work.summary: Navyug Info Solutions helps you convert your business idea into reality.
highlights: Worked as a full stack Web Developer primarily across the technologies EmberJS, Ruby Rack Server, Ruby Datamapper, Grape API.

Developed & Designed a platform independent Desktop Application 'iQ4U'(I Query For You), using Java Swing and SQL, which aids Informatica developers in displaying the dependencies of objects such as Mappings, Sessions, Workflows etc.

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology & Sciences, Pilani
